alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Union; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 6:59PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Gust Front will impact portions of Bradford, northeastern Alachua, central St. Johns, northern Putnam, southwestern Union and Clay Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 658 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a Gust Front along a line extending from near South Ponte Vedra to near Worthington Springs. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Green Cove Springs, Starke, Keystone Heights, Melrose, Worthington Spring, World Golf Village, Saint Augustine Beach, Worthington Springs and Groves. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Union; Western Clay; Western Putnam
